title: 48- hour restriction on designating a claimed  player
custom_steps:
AC
- This is a transaction request entry.
- 48- hour restriction on designating a claimed player - when a player is claimed on OR waivers, the claiming club may not designate that player until 48 hours have elapsed from the time of the waiver claim assignment.  
- Please allow a BOC override in the event we allow a Club to designate that player within that timeframe.

title: 48 Hour Restriction on Asking OR waivers on a claimed player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB
custom_steps: WHEN try to claim a player on OR waivers before the 48hour period is over
custom_expected:
THEN the claiming club will not be allowed to ask for OR waivers on a player until 48 hours have elapsed from the time of the trade.
AND Allow a BOC override in the event they allow the club to ask OR waivers within that timeframe.
AND Driven by waiver request bulletin

title: New Trade Deadline rules
custom_preconds: See: https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-16879
custom_steps:
The new rule works like this:
7/31 is the MJ Contract Trade deadline, but players w/o active MJ contracts can still be traded
9/25(ish) is the hard no trade deadline where no one can be traded ("Trade Close Period" system date)

Updates:

Change "Non-Waiver Trade Deadline" system date to "Major Contract Trade Deadline"
Update Outright(trade) business rule 2.10 (https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Submit+to+Club_+Submit+to+BOC) to fire on submit to club, submit to boc, and approve of any outright(trade) if transaction date is on or after the "Major Contract Trade Deadline" date and any player involved in the trade has an Active MJC.
Add an error message that will fire if above rule check is hit. Something like this:
--"Players with an Active Major League Contract may not be traded after {0}" (replace {0} with "Major Contract Trade Deadline" system date
--Blocker for Clubs, overridable for BOC
Note: users should still be able to trade players who do NOT have an Active MJC after the deadline so the rule check should not fire for players without an active MJC.

Business rule 1.31 (https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Front+End+and+On+Create+Rules) should still work the same as before. This rule should continue to fire if user attempts to create or submit a trade for any player, regardless of whether they have an active MJC, during the "Trade Close Period" system date range.

title: As a User, I want to indicate that cash considerations over $100,000 is meant to offset salary
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN performing a Trade including cash consideration
custom_expected:
THEN for each cash consideration an "Offset Salary" checkbox is available
AND if the entered cash considerations are less than or equal to $100,000, the checkbox will be disabled
AND if the entered cash considerations are greater that $100,000, the checkbox will become enabled
AND On submit, there will be a check to see if the checkbox is checked when the considerations entered are greater than $100,000
AND If the the check fails for Club Users, they will be given a blocking message
       "Cash considerations in excess of $100,000 may only be included for the purpose of offsetting a player's salary."
AND one button will be available       "Back"
BUT if the check fails for BOC Users, they will be given an Overridable Warning
      "Cash considerations in excess of $100,000 may only be included for the purpose of offsetting a player's salary.
AND two buttons will be available.       "Back"           "Ignore & Continue"

title: As a BOC User, I want to delete a player from the Disqualified Player Widget

GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Disqualified+Players
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Disqualified Players widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a trashcan icon on all rows in the Disqualified Players widget
AND clicking the icon will prompt the user to confirm they want to delete the chosen row
AND if the user confirms, the modal will be dismissed and the row will be removed from the widget
AND if the user cancels, the modal will be dismissed and the widget will remain unchanged

custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Baseball Info section of the Pro Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "Disqualified Player" field
AND if the player doesn't appear in the Disqualified Player widget, this flag will be set to No 
AND if the player appears in the Disqualified Player widget, this flag will be set to Yes
AND if the player is removed from the Disqualified Player widget, this flag will be reset to No

title: As a User, I want to see a new paragraph added to the Assignment Agreement if a trade has the Safe Harbor Election checkbox checked
custom_steps:
AC:
 - If an Outright Trade has the Safe Harbor Election checkbox checked, the Assignment Agreement will contain the following paragraph:
  -- â€œEach assignor Club and each assignee Club hereby agree to treat the assignment of each of the contracts listed above consistent with Section 4 of Revenue Procedure 2019-18 issued by the Internal Revenue Service on April 11, 2019 to the extent each such Club is subject to Federal income tax in the United States.â€￾
 - The paragraph will appear immediately after the paragraph that begins with "Each assignor club shall remain liable..." (see attached)
 - If the Safe Harbor box is not checked, the new language will not be included in the Assignment Agreement

title: As a BOC User, I want the system to automatically remove a player from the Disqualified Player widget if he changed Orgs since being added to the widget
custom_steps:
Wireframe: https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=disqualified_players

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Disqualified+Players

AC:
 - If a transaction occurs that cause a player's current Org to be different from the Org he was with when he was added to the widget, the system will remove the player from the widget
 - The system will generate a clipboard notification for BOC users notifying them that the player has been removed from the Disqualified Player widget
 - System will track the 'deleted timestamp' for tracking purposes
 - The column that was added to display the warning should be removed, as players will be automatically removed

title: As a User, I want to be stopped from submitting a trade if it includes a Disqualified Player
custom_steps:
AC:
 - If a Club User submits a trade that includes a player on the Disqualified Player widget and the Safe Harbor Election box is checked, a blocking message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: Safe Harbor cannot be elected. Transaction includes one or more Disqualified Player Contracts. 
  -- **Buttons:** Back


 - If a BOC User submits a trade that includes a player on the Disqualified Player widget and the Safe Harbor Election box is checked, a blocking message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: Safe Harbor cannot be elected. Transaction includes one or more Disqualified Player Contracts. 
  -- **Buttons:** Ignore & Continue, Back

title: As a User, I want to be stopped from submitting a trade if a participating Club does not include at least one player, draft selection, or international slot
custom_steps:
AC:
 - If a Club User submits a trade where an involved Club does not include at least one player, draft selection, or international slot (e.g., one Club assigns cash considerations only in exchange for a player), a blocking message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: Safe Harbor not applicable. At least one Club is not assigning a player contract, draft selection or international slot.
  -- **Buttons:** Back


 - If a BOC User submits a trade where an involved Club does not include at least one player, draft selection, or international slot (e.g., one Club assigns cash considerations only in exchange for a player), a blocking message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: Safe Harbor not applicable. At least one Club is not assigning a player contract, draft selection or international slot.
  -- **Buttons:** Ignore & Continue, Back

title: As a User, I want to be warned that my trade may not ultimately be eligible for Safe Harbor if it includes a PTBNL
custom_steps:
AC:
 - If a User submits a trade that includes a Player To Be Named Later for any Club, a warning message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: This transaction involves a Player to be Named Later. In the event both Clubs subsequently agree to assign a Player to be Named Later whose contract is a Disqualified Player Contract, the Safe Harbor election will be deemed null and void.
  -- **Buttons:** Continue, Back

This message should fire on both 'Submit to Club' and 'Submit to BOC'

title: As a User, I want to be warned that my trade by not ultimately be eligible for Safe Harbor if I choose to send Cash instead of a PTBNL
custom_steps:
AC:
 - If a User submits a trade that includes a Player To Be Named Later for any Club, and that is the only consideration that one Club sends, a warning message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: This transaction involves a Player to be Named Later. In the event both Clubs subsequently agree to a cash payment in lieu of the Player to be Named Later, or in the event both Clubs subsequently agree to assign a Player to be Named Later whose contract is a Disqualified Player Contract, the Safe Harbor election will be deemed null and void.
  -- **Buttons:** Continue, Back

This message should fire on both 'Submit to Club' and 'Submit to BOC'

title: As a User, I would like to send an Add C out for e-signature through email

GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the esign button from an Add C
custom_expected:
THEN  a modal prompting the user to choose how the document will be esigned by each party (Player, Club Signatory) will launch
AND  The two options for players: In Person (will follow current flow), and Email
AND Each of these fields will be pre-populated with the primary email and primary phone number from the players profile
AND Each of the fields will be editable
AND  There will only be one option for Club Signatory: EBIS (will not be editable, as depicted)
AND When all required fields are complete, the Continue button will become active
AND Clicking Continue will bring the user to the esig confirmation modal, as depicted in the wire
AND There will be a cancel button on this modal
AND Clicking the cancel button will dismiss the modal without taking any action

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit a submitted Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN an Edit button will be available anytime the form is in view mode if the viewing user has edit permissions
AND Clicking  Edit will reload the form in edit mode, where there will be a Save button and a Cancel button in place of the Edit button. 
AND Clicking Save will commit changes and reload the form in View mode.
AND Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm they wish to discard their changes
AND If they confirm the decision, their changes will be discarded and the form will reload in view mode
AND If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: **As a BOC User I want to Create a Profile for a Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profile

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to BOC's Drug Test Request widget
AND Clicking the Create New Profile button
custom_expected:
THEN player's without ebis profiles will have a 'Create Profile' button in the ebisID column as depicted
AND Only Admin users will be able to click the button
AND a intl ama match checks will run
AND If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned
AND there will be a Create New Player button and a Cancel button on the modal
AND cicking Cancel will close the modal and return the user to their entry point
AND clicking Create New Player will load a new intl amateur player profile in edit mode
AND the new profile will be pre-populated with information from the Drug Test Request form
AND this includes all Player Info, Contact Info, and Trainer / Agent Info
AND the profile will be subject to all existing rules and will function like other registration profiles
AND the existing drug test request will be linked to the new profile

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN player's without ebis profiles will have a 'Create Profile' button in the ebisID column as depicted
AND Only Admin users will be able to click the button
AND Clicking the Create New Profile button will run intl ama match checks
AND If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned
AND There will be a Create New Player button and a Cancel button on the modal
AND Clicking Cancel will close the modal and return the user to their entry point
AND Clicking Create New Player will load a new intl amateur player profile in edit mode
AND The new profile will be pre-populated with information from the Drug Test Request form
AND This includes all Player Info, Contact Info, and Trainer / Agent Info
AND The profile will be subject to all existing rules and will function like other registration profiles
AND The existing drug test request will be linked to the new profile

title: As a BOC User I want to link an existing Profile to a Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profile

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Request widget
AND searching for for a profile
custom_expected:
THEN If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned
AND There will be a Link Request button on the modal
AND Selecting a matching player will activate the button
AND Clicking the the button will link the request to the selected player and dismiss the modal
AND The widget will reload and the selected player's ebisID will be displayed
AND The player's name will also be a hyperlink the profile
AND Contact Info / Trainer Info will get moved to existing profile as a new origin

title: As a user I want any drug test requests to be moved to the new player ID during an international player merge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club
custom_steps: WHEN performing a merger of two International Amateur Players
custom_expected:
THEN Following the merger any drug request Drug Test Requests (regardless of state) will be move to the new PlayerID
AND The new ID will be reflected in the EBIS ID column of the 3 Drug Testing Widgets

title: Add Fields to Trainer profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347878
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to International Trainer/Agent profile
custom_expected: THEN  Partnership Program (checkbox) and Academy Name will be added to the International Trainer/Agent profile

title: As a Club User I want to create a new blank Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN as is logged in as a Club

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Create New" on the Club's Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN a new blank Drug Test Request form per the provided wireframe. 
AND  Initially, the user would only see the Add Player section, and would be required to complete the required fields to click "Add Player"
AND Once a player has been successfully added to the form, the "Submit to BOC" button is enabled, and the "Add Player" button is greyed out.
AND The form should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe, including the disabling of fields once the player is added to the form.
BUT If the user subsequently removes the added player by clicking the trash can icon, then the Add Player button becomes available again, with the Submit to BOC being greyed out once again.

title: As a Club User I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND On the Club's International Dashboard there is a new "Drug Test Requests" tab.
AND On this tab there is the new Club Drug Test Requests widget.

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN accessing the the Club Drug Test Requests Widget
custom_expected:
THEN The widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe.
AND The widget should only show the viewing Org's drug test requests. 
AND If the player has an ebis profile, the name columns will be a hyperlink to the player's profile
AND The status column will be a hyperlink.  Clicking on a status will open the Request form in view mode

*Status mapping will be handled in a follow up story*

title: As a Club User I want to submit a Drug Test Request for a player to the BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club
AND Player has been added to the Drug Test Request form
AND the Submit to BOC button is enabled.


Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the Submit to BOC button
custom_expected:
THEN a required field and format check will run per the provided data discovery
AND Once the required rules checks have passed, the form's status is updated to "Submitted" 
(for the Club) and "Pending Review" (for the BOC). 
AND The Submitted form should show on the Club's Drug Test Request widget as Submitted.
AND The Submitted form should show on the BOC's Drug Test Request widget as Pending Review.

title: As a Club User I want clicking Add Player on a new Drug Test Request to check if the player already exists in the system
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club


Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Business Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Amateur+-+Profile+Visibility
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks "Add Player" on a Drug Test Request Form,
custom_expected:
THEN the system should check to see if there is already a player profile entered for the information entered that the user has permission to see.
AND This should re-use the existing logic that is checked on the Create New for an International Amateur profile for Club users
AND If a match is found, display the match(es) per the wireframe.
AND The user should have the ability to pick any of the existing profiles OR to add the newly entered information as a "new" player by selecting the appropriate entry via radio button and clicking "Add Player" 
AND The appropriate player's information will be added to the form, and the user will have the opportunity to complete the form as usual. 
BUT Clicking Cancel will close the matching message and return the user to the form with no player added.

title: As a Club User I want to create a new Drug Test Request for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND The Create New Icon on International Amateur player profiles is updated to have the new option of "Drug Test Request".

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Drug Test Request" from the create new menu
custom_expected:
THEN  a new Drug Test Request form for the selected player with their information already prepopulated (including their ebisid) 
will be generated
AND The user should be able to submit the form to the BOC after completing the required information.
AND If the user chooses to 'trash' the added player, it would work just as though they had created this from scratch from the widget.

title: As a BOC User I want to review a Drug Test Request

GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

custom_steps:

custom_expected: THEN the hyperlink will open the request in view mode

title: As a BOC User I want to assign a Drug Test Request to a Registration Analyst
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframes:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_analyst

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the checkbox on a Drug Request's row will activate the "Assign To" button in the footer of the widget
custom_expected:
THEN  A new stand alone permission will be created that can be added to individual ebis account
AND Only users with this permission will appear as possible Registration Analysts
AND Clicking the apply button within the popover will assign the request to specified analyst
AND The assigned requests will now appear on the appropriate analysts request widgets

title: As a BOC Reg Analyst I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the "Drug Test Requests" tab
custom_expected:
THEN On this tab there is the new Reg Analyst Drug Test Requests widget.
AND The widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe. 

*Another story will cover the permissions to hide/show this widget and the other BOC widget, but they will share a tab*

custom_preconds:

custom_expected: THEN the only requests that they are able to see are those that have their username in the "Registration Analyst" field.

AND This bubble will only be visible to BOC Users
AND This bubble will only be editable by BOC Users

AND Only BOC and Reg Analyst Users will be able to edit

title: As a User, I want to view a Doctor Utility widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Employees tab of the Rosters dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "Doctor Utility" widget
AND The widget will be located at the bottom of the tab, below the Translator Utility widget
AND The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Export to excel should work
AND Filters and sorting should be retained

title: As a User, I want to edit the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
custom_expected:
THEN For users with appropriate permissions, there will be a Pencil icon on each row of the widget
AND Clicking the icon will put the row into edit mode
AND For users with appropriate permissions, there will be an Add Doctor button at the bottom of the widget
AND Clicking the Add Doctor button will add a row to the widget
AND The new row will be editable by the user
AND Club users may only edit their own doctors

title: As a User, I want to Save the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=add_doctor

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
AND any of the rows in the Doctor Utility are in Edit Mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Save button
AND clicking save will store the current values and the widget will reload with all rows in view mode
AND after a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification "1 Doctor saved" , "2 Doctors saved"
AND the next time the widget is loaded, the saved values will be displayed

title: As a User, I want to Cancel All Changes to the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=add_doctor

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
AND any of the rows in the Doctors Utility are in Edit Mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Cancel All Changes button
AND Clicking Cancel All Changes will discard all changes made to the widget
AND The widget will reload with all rows in view mode

title: As a User, I want to Delete a Row from the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club


Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=delete_1

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
custom_expected:
THEN there is a trash can icon in each row in the Doctor Utility widget
AND clicking the icon will prompt the user to confirm they wish to remove the row
AND if they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the widget and no action will be taken.
AND if the user deletes a row that has never been saved, there will be no confirmation message

title: As a user, I would like Player ID to appear on the 2nd batch of ebis reports
custom_steps:
Adding Player ID to the second batch of ebis reports:

Player Service Report
Player Transaction Log
NES Players (this report may have some bugs - and there are no players currently in dev to test with)
Organizational Summary Report
Roster Detail
Player Options

title: As a BOC Reg Admin User, I want to Edit the Investigation Type on Submitted Investigation Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND has BOC Reg Admin rights

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Investigation+Form

JIRA: EBISII-16489
SNOW: INC0120558
custom_steps: WHEN an Investigation Request is in submitted state
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Reg Admin users will be able to edit the Investigation Type field
AND the field will not be editable once the Investigation request is Approved
AND Club Users will not be able to edit this field when the Request is in Submitted state

title: As a User, I want PlayerID exported to excel from Advanced Search
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps:
WHEN executing an Advanced Search on:
-- Add C
-- Add D
-- CSP/CEP Invoice
-- CSP/CEP Player Summary
-- Domestic Amateur Player
-- Employee
-- Employee Contract
-- Employee Transactions
-- Intl Amateur Player
-- Intl Player Report
-- Investigations
-- MJC
-- MNC
-- Pro Player
-- Transactions
-- Waivers
-- Winter League Requests
custom_expected:
THEN all Advanced Search types will provide the option to export search results to Excel
AND Excel exports for any search type that returns a player name, will now feature eBis PlayerID in the first column


Note:  This story will not impact result columns in the app, only the excel exports

title: Rewrite MJC Stat Batch to use BAM Stats API
custom_preconds:
Wiki: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJC+Stat+batch
GIVEN MJC stat batch has been rewritten to utilize the BAM Stats API
AND Approved MJCs containing performance bonuses exist for the current year
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the MJC stat batch in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN the batch performance will be improved from before
AND batch will mark bonuses earned or not based on wiki requirements above
AND batch should still work correctly for each Performance Bonus type
